resources.string:
This app was designed for the Fall 2015 SE 300 class with Dr. Jafer by the following developers:

 Team Lead: Jessica Updegrove
 Android Lead: Alex Bassett
 Android Team: Alex Bassett, Jonathan Rach, Jessica Updegrove (assistance)
 Image Processing Team: Dean Laga, Joel Vande Polder, Jessica Updegrove (assistance)
 
This app is meant to be used on the ERAU DB campus to assist visitors, alumni, and new students as they explore the ever-changing campus. To use, take a picture of a building on campus and the app will process the image and return the name of the building. Additional features, such as a campus map and building directory will be added in future versions.

Have fun and we hope you enjoy the app.
Dedicated to creating a mobile app to identify ERAU buildings
